      • War

        public static void War(ArrayList<Card> play1,
                       ArrayList<Card> play2,
                       int index)
        The War method simulates a war, where two cards tie and more cards must be drawn.
        Parameters:
        play1 - Player 1's hand.
        play2 - Player 2's hand.
        index - The index to specify cards within the hand arraylists.
